Time is near, A Wish for Christmas is here! 

- Head over to @MyVMK & give us a follow!
- Give this tweet love & hit that like button! 
- Reply with the hashtag #MyVMK, your in-game name, & your heartfelt Christmas wish! 

Please read below, now let those wishes flow!

Old Disney games are starting to resurface such as #pixiehollow #clubpenguin and #wizard101, but let's be honest #vmk was so good we had to remake it  

#Disneygames #Disneyland  #Disney #Myvmk

65 years ago today, Disneyland opened to the public! Happy 65th Birthday Disneyland! This is the only Disney park built and stepped foot in by Walt Disney himself. Have a Magical Day!! #Disneyland65 #WaltDisney

Disneyland and Disney California Adventure will be closed beginning March 14 through the end of the month.
Walt Disney World Resort has announced it will temporarily close to guests on Sunday, March 15 through the end of the month.
But MyVMK is here 24/7 365! :)
#WDW #Disneyland
